page.home.title: Snapscreen makes TV shareable.
page.home.description: ✓ Share and keep favorite moments of TV ✚ Fast and easy ✚ Get clips ➨ Start Snapping!
page.home.emphasize: Live TV is full of countless shareable moments that happen in the blink of an eye.
page.home.text: To capture and share these moments, you have two options; (1) a fortune teller knows exactly when to hit record; or (2) You have Snapscreen ready on your mobile phone so you never miss a moment. As soon as you witness a shareable moment, take a photo of the screen with Snapscreen and within seconds you'll have a high quality clip of that moment for you to share with your network.

page.vision.title: Our Vision
page.vision.description: ✓ Never miss a moment on TV again ✚ High quality ✚ Share it with friends ➨ Having fun!
page.vision.headline: Making TV and streaming discoverable and shareable.
page.vision.emphasize: Sharing and discovering of TV or streaming moments should be easy, fun and free!
page.vision.text: We realized this to be a real need of people who share photos of TV screens and clunky recordings in social media. We give people a better experience and provide broadcasters new opportunities to interact with them.

page.solution.title: Our Solution
page.solution.description: ✓ Enable viewers to participate ✚ Create clips ✚ Share moments ➨ Democratize TV!
page.solution.headline: As a viewer I want to share and discover moments of TV.
page.solution.emphasize: Have you ever tried sharing what's on TV?
page.solution.text: With Snapscreen you simply take a photo (Snapshot) of a TV or streaming with your mobile. Snapscreen detects instantly the specific moment of the programm. You can rewind in time, create a clip and share this in broadcast quality.

page.business.title: For Broadcasters of linear TV and streaming
page.business.description: ✓ Monetize contents in a new way ✚ Direct backchannel ✚ New target groups ➨ Increase brand value!
page.business.headline: A new way to reach audience and create engagement.
page.business.emphasize: With Snapscreen broadcasters can embrace customer behavior and get a non-intrusive connection to their audience.
page.business.text: Savvy marketers can take advantage by engaging their audience in new and compelling ways. Analytics of usage and interests can be linked back to brand values and win over viewers loyality.

page.faq.title: Frequently asked questions.
page.faq.description: We hope to answer some questions which we hear over and over.
page.faq.headline: There’s no such thing as a stupid question.
page.faq.text: It is in our interest to help you understand our idea and what we provide. We also would like to get your feedback and hear your thoughts. Feel free to ask us anything you like to know.

page.contact.title: Get in touch
page.contact.description: ✓ Talk to us ✚ Individual proposals ✚ Free Demonstration ➨ Understand potentials!
page.contact.headline: Your bright future starts with a simple conversation.
page.contact.emphasize: Whether you are curious how Snapscreen works with you,
page.contact.text: or you’d like to know your growth content potential, we’d love to chat with you.
page.contact.sayThanksEmphasize: Thanks, for your interest in Snapscreen.
page.contact.sayThanks: We are happy to hear from you!

page.try.title: Demo to try Snapscreen
page.try.description: ✓ Try Snapscreen live ✚ With your mobile ✚ Quick and easy ➨ Be surprised!
page.try.headline: Try it now
page.try.howTo1emphasize: Take your Smartphone and scan the QR-code
page.try.howTo1text: to open our Demo app in your mobile browser.
page.try.howTo2emphasize: From there – take a photo of the NBA stream
page.try.instruction: Scan QR code with your smartphone. Allow camera access and Snap!
page.try.engagement: Please, share your Snap on social media or a private message.

page.press.title: Press clippings
page.press.description: Find here some nice articles and press mentions about us.
page.press.headline: Press mentions and updates along our journey.
page.press.emphasize: We are proud that others have found our work as interesting and exciting as us!
page.press.text: Find here some nice articles and press mentions about us.

page.notfound.title: Sorry, not found
page.notfound.description: We are great in detecting TV and streaming contents. Obviously not so in our own website contents.

page.privacy.title: Privacy Policy for Snapscreen
page.privacy.description: We believe you should always know what data we collect from you and how we use it, and that you should have meaningful control over both.
page.privacy.text: That’s the basic purpose of this Privacy Policy.

page.terms.title: Terms of Use for Snapscreen
page.terms.description: These Terms of Service (“Terms”) govern your access to and use of our services, including our websites, APIs, email notifications and applications.
page.terms.text: Please read these Terms fully and carefully before using the Services.

block.giveFeedback.title: Give us Feedback!
block.giveFeedback.text: Let us know how our product could help You in your business. What do you expect, miss or suggest? Please share Your thoughts with us.

block.questions.text: which are related to our product, business and technology.

block.team.text: highly skilled futurists finding new solutions for real problems.

block.userJourney.emphasize: We try to create best ease of use!
block.userJourney.text: Here a simple user journey example with Snapscreen.
block.userJourney.one: Ben is journalist. He follows news on TV. He often sees something that he wants to share and comment in social media.
block.userJourney.two: He takes his mobile, opens Snapscreen and takes a photo of the TV. He can scroll back in time, create the clip to capture the perfect moment.
block.userJourney.three: His high quality clip is save in his Snapscreen profile. So he can share it anytime later. He also can download the clip and share it on Instagram or Youtube.
block.userJourney.four: Snapscreen makes it very easy to create, share and comment on TV contents – within seconds!

block.testimonials.emphasize: Hear the reactions of our mentors
block.testimonials.text: once we showed how Snapscreen works.

block.benefits.text: for broadcasters of linear television or streaming.

benefit.share.text: no matter if you like it or not.
benefit.share.small: Take up an existing habit and make it your own.

benefit.video.small: Use the power of the strongest media.

benefit.habit.small: Let the second screen be your friend.

benefit.deepfakes.small: Enable users to distribute your trusted content.

benefit.distribution.small: Make television a more active content experience.

block.innovation.emphasize: With Snapscreen you can share what's on TV

innovation.clip.small: Snap, clip and share – easy with your mobile.

blockquote.page.home: Snapscreen breaks a barrier in sharing media files in journalism. By snapping a TV getting a high quality clip feels like magic! Free speech at a new level.
blockquote.page.business: With Snapscreen you take a screenshot of the action and it takes you 5 minutes back and then you just can clip it up. Whatever it is that you wanna see or share with your Friends. It is that easy!
blockquote.page.vision: We have proof there is strong desire to share what is on TV.

team.willo.name: Thomas Willomitzer
team.willo.about: Previously co-founder of Last.FM and former CTO of Jumio. With proven ability to shape strategy, lead large teams, drive innovation and ultimately increase market share in a highly competitive international environment.

team.matthias.name: Matthias Grieder
team.matthias.about: Matthias has a 20 years background in design and business development. He understands context by observation, listening and curiosity to find solutions and integrate the best idea. He got a proven ability to lead and manage a wide variety of design and development projects in team and independent situations.

team.markus.name: Markus Rumler
team.markus.about: Internet Entrepreneur, Co-founder and CMO at 42.cx Center of Excellence for Artificial Intelligence AG, previously founding member and CCO at Jumio.Inc and head of PR at Jajah.com. Markus brings in 20+ years of experience and is leading the marketing strategy of Snapscreen.

team.eugene.name: Eugene Zatepyakin
team.eugene.about: Eugene was born in Moscow Russia and lives now in Vienna, Austria. He is well known for his video filter app MSQRD which Facebook acquired in 2016. He doesn’t try to focus on specific topics in his work and experiments. Everything that he touches on seems interesting to him: Generative art, math algorithms, image processing, 3D stuff and so on.
